name: Vassilis Zikas
content: Homepage of Vassilis Zikas Vassilis Zikas JPMorgan Chase Associate Professor Georgia Tech School of Cybersecurity and Privacy School of Computer Science (by courtesy) CODA S0919 Atlanta, GA 30308 email: vzikas gatech.edu My research interests include: Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies Game Theory Cryptography Privacy and AI Muli-Party Computation Distributed Computing I am looking for motivated PhD students with interest in cryptography, blockchain technologies, security, and/or fault-tolerant distributed computing. If you are already a CoC student send me an email. Otherwise, if you are interested in working with me please apply through the official Georgia Tech process and make sure you include the above areas and my name in your application. Latest news: Our paper on f-DP estimators was accepted at Usenix Security 2025. Our paper on fuzzy PSI was accepted at CCS 2025. Excited to have three papers accepted at TCC 2024. Our paper on blockchain security against adversaries with temporary majority control of the underlying resourse was accepted at CSF 2024. Our paper on adaptor sibnagures was accepted at ASIACRYPT 2024. Our paper on black-box differential privacy estimators was accepted at S&P 2024. Excited and honored to be awarded an AnlytiXIN Fellowship!
